root.name: Ape Escape: On the Loose
root.description: PS Vita CompatibilityDespite not being in the official compatibility list, Ape Escape: On The Loose can be played on the PS Vita. To do this, the user must first download the game to the PS3. From there, go to Content Transfer on the PS Vita and select the game for transfer. Once complete, the game will show up on the Vita's menu.

similar_games.game: Jak and Daxter: The Lost Frontier
